title: JVL Long Handle Dustpan and Bristle Brush Set, Turquoise/Grey,
features: Prevents the need for bending down to the floor to sweep, a great aid for the elderly
Dustpan handle consists of a handy clip to simply push in and store the brush
Rubber lip edge on the dustpan helps with efficient dust collection
Lightweight metal pole means the set can easily be moved around the home
Dustpan: 25x26x20cm dustpan pole: 64.5cm brush head: 23x14. 5cm brush total length: 76cm approx
